description:
Whether you were hurt in a car accident on I-99 or injured while working in Hollidaysburg, you need a local Altoona attorney who can help you fight for the money that you deserve.

Since 1982, the law firm of Edgar Snyder & Associates has protected the rights of injury victims. With five office locations across western Pennsylvania, we have represented over 50,000 clients in personal injury, workers' compensation, and Social Security disability cases. We’ve provided more than 350,000 free legal evaluations to help people hurt in all types of accidents and people with disabilities who can't work. Our phones answer 24/7, and you risk nothing by contacting us to ask for help.

If you can't travel to one of our offices, we'll come to you. We can visit you at your home, hospital, or rehab facility. And if you hire our law firm, there's never a fee unless we get money for you.

Our attorneys have achieved numerous awards and honors. Many of our attorneys:

  • Have been selected for inclusion in Pennsylvania Super Lawyers® and Rising Stars®
  • Have earned an AV® Preeminent™ rating from Martindale-Hubbell, the highest possible rating based on legal ability and general ethical standards
  • Have been selected for inclusion in Best Lawyers in America®, a distinction that is based on exhaustive peer reviews
  • Are members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates forums
  • Are Top 100 Trial Lawyers, designated by The National Trial Lawyers
  • Are certified as Civil Trial Advocates by the National Board of Trial Advocacy

In addition, our law firm has received distinctions, including:

  • U.S. News – Best Lawyers “Best Law Firms” – 1st Tier Ranking for Plaintiffs Personal Injury Litigation and Plaintiffs Product Liability Litigation
  • Selection as one of Martindale-Hubbell’s Top Ranked Law Firms. This means that at least one of every three of our attorneys has earned an AV-Preeminent rating.
  • The firm has also been voted a Best Place to Work by employees for several years running.

We're honored to say that we work hard everyday for our clients from all areas of Pennsylvania, West Virginia, Ohio, Virginia and Maryland, providing personalized service that can only come from a deep understanding of our communities. If you've been injured, our law firm can help.

Contact us today for a free legal evaluation at 1-866-9-4EDGAR (1-866-943-3427). We welcome walk-ins during regular business hours — 2900 Plank Road, Suite 4, Altoona, PA 16601.
